name: Lokaly
tag_list: group-buy, whitelabel-group-buy, social-commerce, mobile-loyalty, instore-loyalty, soda, soda-card
overview:
Lokaly provides SaaS white-label social commerce technologies and best-practice support services to media partners in SE Asia.

Acquired by Dealised, part of Sydney-based Pollenizer’s start-up portfolio and additionally funded by Yuuwa Capital (Perth, Australia) and Singtel Innov8 (Singapore), Lokaly has been active in the e-commerce space in Hong Kong since 2010.

Lokaly’s flagship application is SodaCard, an in-store tablet-based loyalty and marketing system.

offices.address1: 19D, VGA Building, 532 Castle Peak Road, Lai Chi Kok
